column6:
CIVIL WAR TIE-IN!,2006,7
Hot on the heals of both smash hits HOUSE OF M and SON OF M, QUICKSILVER returns to X-FACTOR! But is he friend or foe!? Oh, and just so you know, yes, Jamie Madrox and the regular cast of X-FACTOR do appear and they do stuff. Lots of stuff! (Layla knows stuff; X-FACTOR does stuff-get it? Got it? Good)
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Ryan Sook | colorist:Jose Villarrubia
